name: Trekker
description:
Travel along self guided maps. Find objects, complete missions, and record your journey.

Design your own trails, tours, scavenger hunts, hidden caches, spiritual journeys, and outdoor games. Good fun for clubs, teachers, community groups, adventurers, tourists and families who want to share experiences in their neighbourhood, town, or park.

Our goal is to put treks all around the world for everyone to play.

Read more about Trekker.
